answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
You can contact Denver Colorado, Saratoga California, and Chesapeake Virgina.  They have all used private grant writing services and could provide you will information.

answers.author: Ian Coyle
answers.text:
Brian,
Livingston County utilizes the services of a private company to serve as Grant Writer for the county and its departments, plus the towns and villages in the county.  This professional, contractual relationship has been very productive and we have a proven track record of results.

author: Brian Knudsen
text: Are there examples (positive and negative) in organizations who have privatized their grant writing function?
title: Grant writing - privatization
